title: Variable ocnBgchem.sisi.tavg-u-hxy-si.mon.GLB (SImon.sisi)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea_ice (mask=siconc) depth: sum where sea_ice time: mean
Comment: Vertically-integrated amount of silicate in ice algae, expressed in moles of silicon per square meter of sea ice.
Long name: Dissolved Silicon Amount in Sea Ice
Processing notes: Note that SIMIP requests the area-weighted average for all intensive variables (i.e., variables that are not proportional to area fraction such as albedo, temperature, or heat flux). Hence, all time samples with non-zero sea-ice fraction are first multiplied by area fraction, then summed, and then divided by the sum of the area fractions. See Appendix C of Notz et al. (2016) for more detail.

title: Variable ocnBgchem.sino3.tavg-u-hxy-si.mon.GLB (SImon.sino3)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea_ice (mask=siconc) depth: sum where sea_ice time: mean
Comment: Vertically-integrated amount of nitrate in ice algae, expressed in moles of nitrogen per square meter of sea ice.
Long name: Dissolved Nitrate Amount in Sea Ice
Processing notes: Note that SIMIP requests the area-weighted average for all intensive variables (i.e., variables that are not proportional to area fraction such as albedo, temperature, or heat flux). Hence, all time samples with non-zero sea-ice fraction are first multiplied by area fraction, then summed, and then divided by the sum of the area fractions. See Appendix C of Notz et al. (2016) for more detail.

title: Variable ocnBgchem.sigpp.tavg-u-hxy-si.mon.GLB (SImon.sigpp)
Cell methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (mask=siconc)
Comment: Change in ice algal carbon mass due to photosynthesis per sea ice unit area per unit time.
Long name: Gross Primary Productivity in Sea Ice as Carbon Amount Flux
Processing notes: Note that SIMIP requests the area-weighted average for all intensive variables (i.e., variables that are not proportional to area fraction such as albedo, temperature, or heat flux). Hence, all time samples with non-zero sea-ice fraction are first multiplied by area fraction, then summed, and then divided by the sum of the area fractions. See Appendix C of Notz et al. (2016) for more detail.

title: Variable ocnBgchem.sichl.tavg-u-hxy-si.mon.GLB (SImon.sichl)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea_ice (mask=siconc) depth: sum where sea_ice time: mean
Comment: Vertically-integrated content of Chl-a in ice algae, expressed as kg of Chl-a per square meter of sea ice.
Long name: Amount of Total Ice Algae Expressed as Chlorophyll in Sea Ice
Processing notes: Note that SIMIP requests the area-weighted average for all intensive variables (i.e., variables that are not proportional to area fraction such as albedo, temperature, or heat flux). Hence, all time samples with non-zero sea-ice fraction are first multiplied by area fraction, then summed, and then divided by the sum of the area fractions. See Appendix C of Notz et al. (2016) for more detail.

title: Variable ocnBgchem.sialgc.tavg-u-hxy-si.mon.GLB (SImon.sialgc)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea_ice (mask=siconc) depth: sum where sea_ice time: mean
Comment: Vertically-integrated content of carbon in ice algae, expressed as moles of carbon per square meter of sea ice.
Long name: Total Ice Algal Carbon Amount in Sea Ice
Processing notes: Note that SIMIP requests the area-weighted average for all intensive variables (i.e., variables that are not proportional to area fraction such as albedo, temperature, or heat flux). Hence, all time samples with non-zero sea-ice fraction are first multiplied by area fraction, then summed, and then divided by the sum of the area fractions. See Appendix C of Notz et al. (2016) for more detail.

title: Variable ocnBgchem.intppnano.tavg-u-hxy-sea.mon.GLB (Omon.intppnano)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea depth: sum where sea (over entire ocean column) time: mean
Comment: Vertically integrated total primary (organic carbon) production by nanophytoplankton.
Long name: Net Primary Organic Carbon Production by Nanophytoplankton

title: Variable ocnBgchem.expsiob.tavg-u-hxy-sea.mon.GLB (Omon.expsiob)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Downward sinking flux of particulate silicon at seafloor
Long name: Sinking Flux of Particulate Silicon Reaching the Ocean Bottom
Processing notes: Variable value should be reported as the flux exiting the bottom of the deepest ocean layer

title: Variable ocnBgchem.exppob.tavg-u-hxy-sea.mon.GLB (Omon.exppob)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Downward sinking flux of particulate organic phosphorus at seafloor
Long name: Sinking Flux of Particulate Organic Phosphorus Reaching the Ocean Bottom
Processing notes: Variable value should be reported as the flux exiting the bottom of the deepest ocean layer

title: Variable ocnBgchem.expnob.tavg-u-hxy-sea.mon.GLB (Omon.expnob)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Downward sinking flux of particulate organic nitrogen at seafloor
Long name: Sinking Flux of Particulate Organic Nitrogen Reaching the Ocean Bottom
Processing notes: Variable value should be reported as the flux exiting the bottom of the deepest ocean layer

title: Variable ocnBgchem.expfeob.tavg-u-hxy-sea.mon.GLB (Omon.expfeob)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Downward sinking flux of particulate iron at seafloor
Long name: Sinking Flux of Particulate Iron Reaching the Ocean Bottom
Processing notes: Variable value should be reported as the flux exiting the bottom of the deepest ocean layer

title: Variable ocnBgchem.expcob.tavg-u-hxy-sea.mon.GLB (Omon.expcob)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Downward sinking flux of particulate organic carbon at seafloor
Long name: Sinking Flux of Particulate Organic Carbon Reaching the Ocean Bottom
Processing notes: Variable value should be reported as the flux exiting the bottom of the deepest ocean layer

title: Variable ocnBgchem.expcalcob.tavg-u-hxy-sea.mon.GLB (Omon.expcalcob)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Downward sinking flux of calcite at seafloor
Long name: Sinking Flux of Calcite Reaching the Ocean Bottom
Processing notes: Variable value should be reported as the flux exiting the bottom of the deepest ocean layer

title: Variable ocnBgchem.exparagob.tavg-u-hxy-sea.mon.GLB (Omon.exparagob)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Downward sinking flux of aragonite at seafloor
Long name: Sinking Flux of Aragonite Reaching the Ocean Bottom
Processing notes: Variable value should be reported as the flux exiting the bottom of the deepest ocean layer

title: Variable ocnBgchem.expcalc.tavg-d1000m-hxy-sea.mon.GLB (Omon.epcalc1000)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: The phrase 'expressed_as' is used in the construction A_expressed_as_B, where B is a chemical constituent of A. It means that the quantity indicated by the standard name is calculated solely with respect to the B contained in A, neglecting all other chemical constituents of A. In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics. 'Sinking' is the gravitational settling of particulate matter suspended in a liquid. A sinking flux is positive downwards and is calculated relative to the movement of the surrounding fluid. Calcite is a mineral that is a polymorph of calcium carbonate. The chemical formula of calcite is CaCO3. Standard names also exist for aragonite, another polymorph of calcium carbonate.
Long name: Downward Flux of Calcite at 1000m
Processing notes: see Omon.epcalc100

title: Variable ocnBgchem.expc.tavg-d1000m-hxy-sea.mon.GLB (Omon.epc1000)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: The phrase 'expressed_as' is used in the construction A_expressed_as_B, where B is a chemical constituent of A. It means that the quantity indicated by the standard name is calculated solely with respect to the B contained in A, neglecting all other chemical constituents of A. In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics. 'Sinking' is the gravitational settling of particulate matter suspended in a liquid. A sinking flux is positive downwards and is calculated relative to the movement of the surrounding fluid.
Long name: Downward Flux of Particulate Organic Carbon at 1000m
Processing notes: see Omon.epc100

title: Variable ocnBgchem.zooc.tavg-ol-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.zooc)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: sum of zooplankton carbon component concentrations
Long name: Zooplankton Carbon Concentration

title: Variable ocnBgchem.zmicro.tavg-ol-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.zmicro)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: carbon concentration from the microzooplankton (<20 um) component alone
Long name: Mole Concentration of microzooplankton Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water

title: Variable ocnBgchem.zmeso.tavg-ol-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.zmeso)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: carbon concentration from mesozooplankton (20-200 um) component alone
Long name: Mole Concentration of Mesozooplankton Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water

title: Variable ocnBgchem.phypico.tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.phypico)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Mole Concentration of Picophytoplankton Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water
Long name: Carbon concentration of picophytoplankton

title: Variable ocnBgchem.phynano.tavg-u-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.phynano)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Mole Concentration of Nanophytoplankton Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water
Long name: Mole Concentration of Nanophytoplankton Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water
Processing notes: Analogous to Oday.phyc

title: Variable ocnBgchem.phymisc.tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.phymiscos)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Mole Concentration of Miscellaneous Phytoplankton Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water
Long name: Surface concentration of miscellaneous phytoplankton

title: Variable ocnBgchem.phydiaz.tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.phydiazos)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Mole Concentration of Diazotrophs Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water
Long name: Surface concentration of diazotrophs

title: Variable ocnBgchem.phydiat.tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.phydiatos)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Mole Concentration of Diatoms Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water
Long name: Surface concentration of diatoms

title: Variable ocnBgchem.phycalc.tavg-ol-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.phycalc)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Mole Concentration of Calcareous Phytoplankton Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water
Long name: Mole Concentration of Calcareous Phytoplankton Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water
Processing notes: "Tracer" concentrations should be reported even if they are diagnosed rather than prognostically calculated.

title: Variable ocnBgchem.phyc.tavg-op20bar-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.phyc200)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: sum of phytoplankton carbon component concentrations. In most (all?) cases this is the sum of phycdiat and phycmisc (i.e., "Diatom Carbon Concentration" and "Non-Diatom Phytoplankton Carbon Concentration"
Long name: Phytoplankton Carbon Concentration
Processing notes: The variable at the depth of 200 meters is requested

title: Variable ocnBgchem.ph.tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.phos)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Near surface negative log10 of hydrogen ion concentration with the concentration expressed as mol H kg-1.
Long name: Surface pH

title: Variable ocnBgchem.ph.tavg-op20bar-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.ph200)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: negative log10 of hydrogen ion concentration with the concentration expressed as mol H kg-1.
Long name: pH
Processing notes: The variable at the depth of 200 meters is requested.

title: Variable ocnBgchem.o2.tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.o2os)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Near surface 'Mole concentration' means number of moles per unit volume, also called "molarity", and is used in the construction mole_concentration_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y. A chemical or biological species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as 'nitrogen' or a phrase such as 'nox_expressed_as_nitrogen'. The chemical formula for molecular oxygen is O2.
Long name: Surface Dissolved Oxygen Concentration

title: Variable ocnBgchem.o2min.tavg-u-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.o2min)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: mole concentration of oxygen at the local minimum in the concentration profile that occurs closest to the sea surface.
Long name: Oxygen Minimum Concentration

title: Variable ocnBgchem.o2.tavg-op20bar-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.o2200)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: 'Mole concentration' means number of moles per unit volume, also called "molarity", and is used in the construction mole_concentration_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y. A chemical or biological species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as 'nitrogen' or a phrase such as 'nox_expressed_as_nitrogen'.
Long name: Dissolved Oxygen Concentration at 200 meters
Processing notes: The variable at the depth of 200 meters is requested.

title: Variable ocnBgchem.intpp.tavg-u-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.intpp)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea depth: sum where sea (over entire ocean column) time: mean
Comment: Vertically integrated total primary (organic carbon) production by phytoplankton. This should equal the sum of intpdiat+intpphymisc, but those individual components may be unavailable in some models.
Long name: Primary Organic Carbon Production by All Types of Phytoplankton

title: Variable ocnBgchem.intpoc.tavg-u-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.intpoc)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea depth: sum where sea (over entire ocean column) time: mean
Comment: Vertically integrated POC
Long name: Particulate Organic Carbon Content

title: Variable ocnBgchem.expcob.tavg-u-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.expcob)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Downward sinking flux of particulate organic carbon at seafloor. Reported at the sea floor depth for present day relative to z=0 geoid. Reported as missing for land grid cells.
Long name: Sinking Flux of Particulate Organic Carbon Reaching the Ocean Bottom
Processing notes: Variable value should be reported as the flux exiting the bottom of the deepest ocean layer

title: Variable ocnBgchem.dissoc.tavg-ol-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.dissoc)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Sum of dissolved carbon component concentrations explicitly represented (i.e. not ~40 uM refractory unless explicit)
Long name: Dissolved Organic Carbon Concentration

title: Variable ocnBgchem.detoc.tavg-ol-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.detoc)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: sum of detrital organic carbon component concentrations
Long name: Detrital Organic Carbon Concentration

title: Variable ocnBgchem.co3satarag.tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.co3sataragos)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Near surface mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the carbonate anion (CO3) for sea water in equilibrium with pure Aragonite. Aragonite (CaCO3) is a mineral that is a polymorph of calcium carbonate.
Long name: Surface Mole Concentration of Carbonate Ion in Equilibrium with Pure Aragonite in Sea Water

title: Variable ocnBgchem.co3satarag.tavg-op20bar-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.co3satarag200)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the carbonate anion (CO3) for sea water in equilibrium with pure Aragonite. Aragonite (CaCO3) is a mineral that is a polymorph of calcium carbonate.
Long name: Mole Concentration of Carbonate Ion in Equilibrium with Pure Aragonite in Sea Water
Processing notes: The variable at the depth of 200 meters is requested.

title: Variable ocnBgchem.co3.tavg-d0m-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.co3os)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Near surface mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the carbonate anion (CO3).
Long name: Surface Carbonate Ion Concentration

title: Variable ocnBgchem.co3.tavg-op20bar-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.co3200)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the carbonate anion (CO3).
Long name: Carbonate Ion Concentration
Processing notes: The variable at the depth of 200 meters is requested.

title: Variable ocnBgchem.chl.tavg-op20bar-hxy-sea.day.GLB (Oday.chl200)
Cell methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
Comment: Sum of chlorophyll from all phytoplankton group concentrations. In most models this is equal to chldiat+chlmisc, that is the sum of Diatom Chlorophyll Mass Concentration and Other Phytoplankton Chlorophyll Mass Concentration
Long name: Mass Concentration of Total Phytoplankton Expressed as Chlorophyll in Sea Water at 200 meters
Processing notes: The variable at the depth of 200 meters is requested.
